params._gasTarget: desired gas target for initial vote
params._lockupDuration: duration to lock tokens for - determines vote multiplier

params._gasTarget: desired gas target for initial vote
params._lockupDuration: duration to lock tokens for - determines vote multiplier

params._creatorRewardsAccount: Address that creator rewards get sent to
params._currentEpochStartDate: Start date for the first epoch
params._epochLength: The length of each epoch in seconds
params._genesis: Address of the EGL Genesis contract
params._poolToken: Address of the Balance Pool Token (BPT)
params._seedAccounts: List of accounts to seed with EGL's
params._seedAmounts: Amount of EGLS's to seed accounts with
params._votingPauseSeconds: Number of seconds to pause voting before votes are tallied

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params._eglAmount: Amount of EGL's to vote with

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._eglAmount: Amount of EGL's to vote with

addSeedAccount(address,uint256).notice: Owner only function to add a seeder account with specified number of EGL's. Amount cannot exceed balance allocated for seed/signal accounts

claimSeederEgls(uint256,uint8).notice: Function for seed/signal accounts to claim their EGL's. EGL's get locked up in a vote right away and can  only be withdrawn after the seeder/signal lockup period

claimSupporterEgls(uint256,uint8).notice: Allows EGL Genesis contributors to claim their "bonus" EGL's from contributing in Genesis. Bonus EGL's get locked up in a vote right away and can only be withdrawn once all BPT's are available

initialize(address,address,address,uint2.notice: Initialized contract variables and sets up token bucket sizes

pauseEgl().notice: Ower only funciton to pause contract

reVote(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Re-Vote to change parameters of an existing vote. Will not shorten the time the tokens are  locked up from the original vote

renounceOwnership().notice: Do not allow owner to renounce ownership, only transferOwnership

sweepPoolRewards().notice: Send EGL reward to miner of the block. Reward caclulated based on how close the block gas limit is to the desired EGL. The closer it is, the higher the reward

tallyVotes().notice: Tally Votes for the most recent epoch and calculate the new desired EGL amount

unpauseEgl().notice: Owner only function to unpause contract

vote(uint256,uint256,uint8).notice: Submit vote to either increase or decrease the desired gas limit

withdraw().notice: Withdraw EGL's once they have matured

withdrawPoolTokens().notice: Allows for the withdrawal of liquidity pool tokens once they have matured
